title: Rename brand text from “Caffeine Jobs” to “M Employed” in frontend UI and document title

requirements.summary: Replace all user-facing occurrences of the brand text “Caffeine Jobs” with “M Employed” across the frontend UI, including the Landing page CTA sentence.
acceptanceCriteria: The Landing page CTA line no longer contains “Caffeine Jobs” and uses “M Employed” instead.
No user-facing text in the frontend UI contains the substring “Caffeine Jobs” after the change (case-insensitive check recommended).
The replacement uses English user-facing text.

file_operations.description: Update the CTA sentence copy to replace “Join Caffeine Jobs today and take the next step in your career journey” with the same sentence using “M Employed”.
Update the onboarding header text “Welcome to Caffeine Jobs” to “Welcome to M Employed” to remove remaining user-facing brand references.

requirements.summary: Update the browser tab/page title to “M Employed” in the HTML entry point.
acceptanceCriteria: The title change does not break app bootstrapping (root mount remains functional).

file_operations.description: Replace the existing <title> value “Employer–Employee Connection Website (Job Marketplace)” with an English title that includes “M Employed” (e.g., simply “M Employed”).
